Our Mindful Eating Group

Organizational Meeting on Thursday Sept 16,
Cromwell, Ct @ 7 p.m.



You are invited to help the BFF of Ct establish a new Buddhist group in Connecticut which will be dedicated to mindful and healthy eating and drinking using a holistic approach with Buddhist spirituality. There are a few books available on this topic but we will be using Savor written by Thich Nhat Hanh and Dr. Lilian Cheung. We highly recommend this book.

This Thursday, we will need to set up the Group’s meeting format, possible rituals, length and content of discussions, prayers, outreach etc. Also, we need to figure out a location for meetings, times, day of the week, web site, meet up group etc.

Are you interested? Then, attend an organizational meeting in Cromwell on Thursday. September 16 at 7 p.m. If you can’t come, then look for future announcements on when it will be officially inaugurated in October.

As a reminder: inspired by the book Savor, our Mindful Eating Group will focus on such things like:

1) The Buddhist perspective on weight control

2) Nutrition

3) How to really appreciate your food

4) Actions plans for mindful eating and living

5) Helping create a more mindful world around us



Contact us in order to attend Thursday’s meeting



If you are interested in attending this organizational meeting, then e-mail the Buddhist Faith Fellowship at pam153@sbcglobal.net to get easy directions to meeting location in Cromwell.




Let’s make an idea happen
